name: WPL Absolute Bike Grease 113g
description: A nice alternative to petroleum based lube. Absolute Bike Grease is water-repellant, extremely slippery and safe for carbon parts. Ideal for winter commuting, it doesn't seize up at low temperatures.Safe for rubber and suspension seals, as well as bearings, bushings, headset and hubs.Temperature range is -40 to 120°C.Petroleum-free formula is biodegradable, non-toxic and extremely waterproof.
